metadata.notes: Videos for divorce prevention counseling, including existing and AI-generated content from highly recommended speakers. Hypothetical URLs to be replaced with real links.

source_reference.text: Video: '5 Tips for a Successful Marriage' by Dr. Gary Chapman on 100huntley (Jan 8, 2018)

entries.content_summary: Dr. Gary Chapman shares five practical tips for a strong marriage, focusing on love languages and communication.
entries.content_detailed: Dr. Gary Chapman, author of 'The 5 Love Languages,' provides five actionable tips to enhance marital communication and love, emphasizing understanding each other's love languages. The video is hosted by 100 Huntley Street, a Christian program.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Love Is Found in Deeds… Not Words | Tony Evans Sermon Clip' by Dr. Tony Evans on Tony Evans (Apr 12, 2023)

entries.content_summary: Dr. Tony Evans emphasizes love as a choice through actions in marriage.
entries.content_detailed: Dr. Tony Evans explores the biblical principle that love is a choice, not just an emotion, encouraging couples to show love through deeds. The sermon clip is part of his broader ministry at Oak Cliff Bible Fellowship.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Kingdom Citizenship Success Laws of Marriage | Dr. Myles Munroe' by Dr. Myles Munroe on Munroe Global (Apr 27, 2018)

entries.content_summary: Dr. Myles Munroe outlines biblical laws for successful marriages as a covenant.
entries.content_detailed: Dr. Myles Munroe details specific laws for successful marriages, emphasizing marriage as a covenant, not a contract, and the roles God ordained for husbands and wives. The video is part of Munroe Global’s teachings.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Marriage In Light of Eternity | Francis Chan' by Francis Chan on Crazy Love Ministries (May 10, 2023)

entries.content_summary: Francis Chan discusses marriage from an eternal perspective.
entries.content_detailed: A YouTube Short by Francis Chan emphasizing the eternal significance of marriage, encouraging couples to view their relationship in light of God’s eternal plan.

source_reference.text: Video: 'The Devil is Your Marriage Counselor | Jimmy Evans' by Jimmy Evans on MarriageToday (Jun 15, 2016)

entries.content_summary: Jimmy Evans warns against unresolved anger in marriage.
entries.content_detailed: Jimmy Evans, founder of MarriageToday, discusses how unresolved anger can act as a destructive force in marriage, offering biblical solutions for forgiveness and reconciliation. Search MarriageToday’s YouTube channel for the exact video.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Christian Marriage Counseling -- The Art of Marriage' by FamilyLife (Jun 11, 2014)

entries.content_summary: A FamilyLife video event with practical counseling for couples.
entries.content_detailed: The Art of Marriage by FamilyLife features speakers like Dave and Ann Wilson, offering practical counseling for couples to strengthen their marriage through communication and biblical principles. Search FamilyLife’s YouTube channel for the video.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Kingdom Culture Influence of Relationships Part 1 | Dr. Myles Munroe' by Dr. Myles Munroe on Munroe Global (Jun 30, 2019)

entries.content_summary: Dr. Myles Munroe explores how Kingdom culture strengthens relationships.
entries.content_detailed: Dr. Myles Munroe discusses how the Kingdom of God’s principles should influence relationships, emphasizing cultural alignment for strong marriages. Part 1 of a series by Munroe Global.

source_reference.text: Video: 'The Priority of Culture In Relationships Part 1 | Dr. Myles Munroe' by Dr. Myles Munroe on Munroe Global (Jul 21, 2019)

entries.content_summary: Dr. Myles Munroe discusses cultural priorities in relationships.
entries.content_detailed: Dr. Myles Munroe emphasizes the importance of Kingdom culture in shaping strong marital relationships, focusing on communication and foundational principles. Part 1 of a series by Munroe Global.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Marriage Counseling Advice | How to Save Your Marriage' by FamilyLife (Aug 20, 2019)

entries.content_summary: A motivational video with practical advice to prevent divorce.
entries.content_detailed: FamilyLife’s video provides actionable advice to save marriages, focusing on forgiveness and communication, featuring speakers like Dave and Ann Wilson. Search FamilyLife’s YouTube channel for the video.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Free Christian Marriage Seminar/Counseling – In Love for Life' by Mike Mazzalongo (May 10, 2018)

entries.content_summary: Mike Mazzalongo discusses the history of love and modern marriage concepts.
entries.content_detailed: Mike Mazzalongo’s seminar explores the historical and biblical foundations of love in marriage, offering insights for couples to build a lasting relationship. Search In Love for Life’s YouTube channel for the video.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Financial Unity for Orthodox Couples' (AI-Generated, Kenyan Orthodox) (2025)

entries.content_summary: An animated Kenyan pastor guides couples on budgeting and prayer.
entries.content_detailed: A 4-minute AI-generated video featuring an animated Kenyan Orthodox pastor guiding couples on budgeting and prayer to reduce financial stress, referencing Proverbs 3:9-10 and African communal values. Generate using Synthesia and upload to YouTube.

source_reference.text: Video: 'Rebuilding Trust in Marriage' (AI-Generated, Philippine Evangelical) (2025)

entries.content_summary: An animated Filipino couple shares how counseling restored trust.
entries.content_detailed: A 3-minute AI-generated video of an animated Filipino couple sharing how church counseling and prayer restored trust after conflict, citing 1 Corinthians 13:7. Generate using Synthesia and upload to YouTube.
